column4: coz Oh ok.  so that's what those instructions meant. I was confused.
If you have a suggestion, I can send it to the appropriate people for you :)

the tab instructions weren't clear enough. they just confused me.  if someone could just add that you start typing the nick then hit tab, the nick is completed and alerts the recipient that they have a msg.  something along those lines would help. i really had no idea what the bot was trying to tell me.
alright, I'll see what I can do about making it clearer :)
